forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny along with windy conditions during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Windy early. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
